dict.acceptation: 通过双方协议来计划或安排；调整，解决；

sent.orig: Farm concert: a free of charge concert inviting audience from different backgrounds to enjoy band music.
sent.trans: 音乐会：费用全免的公开乐队表演，邀请各界人士入场欣赏。

sent.orig: That was my first concert and it made me happy it was a worship concert.
sent.trans: 第一次的演唱会，是一场敬拜演唱会我非常开心。

sent.orig: Once the concert starts, nobody is allowed to enter concert hall.
sent.trans: 一旦音乐会开始了，没人可以进去。

sent.orig: A Special Concert to Commemorate Maestro Luciano Pavarotti was held at our Concert Hall tonight.
sent.trans: 由中央音乐学院与意大利驻华大使馆联合举办的“纪念帕瓦罗蒂音乐晚会”于今晚在学院音乐厅举行。

sent.orig: Only some upper societies can get the comps of this concert.
sent.trans: 只有一些上层人物才能获得这场音乐会的赠券。
